Post.title: Ansible Inventory
Post._content:
Ansible  Inventory  `/etc/ansible/hosts`

 Inventory  `host` `host` ssh 22

```
[group1]
host1
host2

[group2]
host2
host3

[group3:children]
group1
group2
```

 host2  group1  group2  group1  group2  group3  host1host2host3  group3 

 host 

```
[group1:vars]
ansible_ssh_port=2222
ansible_ssh_user=root
```

 Inventory 

```
ansible_ssh_host
      .,.

ansible_ssh_port
      ssh.,.

ansible_ssh_user
       ssh 

ansible_ssh_pass
      ssh (, --ask-pass  SSH )

ansible_sudo_pass
      sudo (, --ask-sudo-pass)

ansible_sudo_exe (new in version 1.8)
      sudo (1.8)

ansible_connection
      .:local, ssh  paramiko. Ansible 1.2 paramiko.1.2  'smart','smart'  ControlPersist, 'ssh' .

ansible_ssh_private_key_file
      ssh ., SSH .

ansible_shell_type
      shell., 'sh' , 'csh'  'fish'.

ansible_python_interpreter
       python .:  Python, "/usr/bin/python",  \*BSD,  /usr/bin/python
       2.X  Python. "/usr/bin/env" ,, "python"  python(python26).

       ansible_python_interpreter , ruby  perl ....
```

Post.title: YAML
Post._content:
YMALYMAL Aint Markup Language

```yaml
---
# 
name: Example Developer
job: Developer
skill: Elite
employed: True
foods:
    - Apple
    - Orange
    - Strawberry
    - Mango
languages:
    ruby: Elite
    python: Elite
    dotnet: Lame
```


* YAML  ---  YAML 
*  key: value 
*  -  + 
* 
* 
*  {{ var }}

Post.title: Docker  MySQL
Post._content:
Docker  MySQL  root 

```shell
docker pull mysql:latest
docker run -p 9527:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root -d mysql
```

 MySQL 

```
ERROR 2059 (HY000): Authentication plugin 'caching_sha2_password' cannot be loaded: /usr/lib64/mysql/plugin/caching_sha2_password.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```

 `caching_sha2_password`  `SELECT user, host, plugin, authentication_string FROM user WHERE user='root';`  root  `caching_sha2_password`  `caching_sha2_password` 

 `mysql_native_password` `ALTER USER 'root'@'%' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY 'root';`  root  `mysql_native_password` MySQL

Post.title: Python re.findall()
Post.raw:
---
title: Python re.findall() 
date: 2018-08-11 14:27:45
tags:
  - Python
  - 
  - 
---

 Python  `re.search()`  `re.findall()` 

 `([0-9A-F]{2}:){5}[0-9A-F]{2}`  MAC  12:34:56:78:90:AB 

 `re.search()` 

```python
import re
match = re.search('([0-9A-F]{2}:){5}[0-9A-F]{2}', '12:34:56:78:90:AB').group()
print(match)
```

 '12:34:56:78:90:AB' 

 `re.findall()` 

```python
import re
match = re.findall('([0-9A-F]{2}:){5}[0-9A-F]{2}', '12:34:56:78:90:AB')
print(match)
```

 ['90:']

 `re.findall()`  `[0-9A-F]{2}:`  `{5}` 

 `re.findall()` 

```python
import re
match = re.findall('(([0-9A-F]{2}:){5}[0-9A-F]{2})', '12:34:56:78:90:AB')
print(match)
```

 [('12:34:56:78:90:AB', '90:')] 

   ()  ()
Post.content:
Python re.search() re.findall()

([0-9A-F]{2}:){5}[0-9A-F]{2} MAC 12:34:56:78:90:AB

re.search()

12:34:56:78:90:AB

re.findall()

[90:]

re.findall() [0-9A-F]{2}: {5}

re.findall()

[(12:34:56:78:90:AB, 90:)]

() ()
Post.more:
Python re.search() re.findall()

([0-9A-F]{2}:){5}[0-9A-F]{2} MAC 12:34:56:78:90:AB

re.search()

12:34:56:78:90:AB

re.findall()

[90:]

re.findall() [0-9A-F]{2}: {5}

re.findall()

[(12:34:56:78:90:AB, 90:)]

() ()

Post.title: sshkey  ssh
Post._content:
root failed logins  ssh  22  hack  ssh 



 sshkey  ssh  ssh  22 sshkey ssh key 

 ssh-keygen -t rsa  `~/.ssh`  `id_rsa`  `id_rsa.pub`  `id_rsa.pub`  `~/.ssh`  `cat id_rsa.pub >> authorized_keys` 

 ssh  `/etc/ssh/sshd_config`  `PasswordAuthentication`  `no` ssh  ssh

Post.content:
root failed logins ssh 22 hack ssh

sshkey ssh ssh 22 sshkey ssh key

ssh-keygen -t rsa ~/.ssh id_rsa id_rsa.pub id_rsa.pub ~/.ssh cat id_rsa.pub >> authorized_keys

ssh /etc/ssh/sshd_config PasswordAuthentication no ssh ssh

ssh /etc/ssh/sshd_config PasswordAuthentication no ssh ssh

Post.title: CentOS 7  LAMP
Post._content:
WordPress  LAMP 

 LAMP 

```shell
#  Apache
yum -y install httpd
# 
systemctl start httpd.service
# 
systemctl enable httpd.service
 
#  MySQL CentOS 7  MariaDB MySQL
yum -y install mariadb mariadb-server
# 
systemctl start mariadb.service
# 
systemctl enable mariadb.service
# 
mysql_secure_installation
 
#  PHP
yum -y install php
#  PHP 
yum -y install php-gd php-ldap php-odbc php-pear php-xml php-xmlrpc php-mbstring php-snmp php-soap curl curl-devel php-mysql
# 
systemctl restart httpd.service
```

Post.title: Linux  sudo
Post._content:
Linux  `sudo`  `sudoers`  `sudo` {user} is not in the sudoers file `sudoers` 

 root 

```shell
visudo
```

 `sudoers` 

```
{user} ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL
%{user} ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL # {user} sudo 
```

 `sudo` 

4 ALL  1  ALL (user) 2  ALL  3  ALL (run_as_user,  root, oracle) 4 ALL

Post.title: Python 3
Post._content:
Python 3  Python 3 Linux  Python 2  Python 3 Linux  `yum` Python 2 Python 3  Python 2



```shell
# 
version="3.6.2"

# 
yum -y groupinstall "Development tools"
yum -y install zlib-devel bzip2-devel openssl-devel ncurses-devel sqlite-devel readline-devel tk-devel gdbm-devel db4-devel libpcap-devel xz-devel

#  Python 3 
which wget || yum -y install wget
wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/$version/Python-$version.tar.xz

# 
mkdir /usr/local/python3
mv ./Python-$version.tar.xz /usr/local/python3
cd /usr/local/python3
tar -xvJf  Python-$version.tar.xz
cd Python-$version
which gcc || yum install -y gcc
./configure --prefix=/usr/local/python3
make && make install

#  Python 3  pip3 
ln -s /usr/local/python3/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python3
ln -s /usr/local/python3/bin/pip3 /usr/bin/pip3
```
Post.raw:
---
title:  Python 3
date: 2016-02-14 13:55:31
tags:
  - Linux
  - Python
  - 
---

 Python 3  Python 3 Linux  Python 2  Python 3 Linux  `yum` Python 2 Python 3  Python 2



```shell
# 
version="3.6.2"

# 
yum -y groupinstall "Development tools"
yum -y install zlib-devel bzip2-devel openssl-devel ncurses-devel sqlite-devel readline-devel tk-devel gdbm-devel db4-devel libpcap-devel xz-devel

#  Python 3 
which wget || yum -y install wget
wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/$version/Python-$version.tar.xz

# 
mkdir /usr/local/python3
mv ./Python-$version.tar.xz /usr/local/python3
cd /usr/local/python3
tar -xvJf  Python-$version.tar.xz
cd Python-$version
which gcc || yum install -y gcc
./configure --prefix=/usr/local/python3
make && make install

#  Python 3  pip3 
ln -s /usr/local/python3/bin/python3 /usr/bin/python3
ln -s /usr/local/python3/bin/pip3 /usr/bin/pip3
```
Post.content: Python 3 Python 3 Linux Python 2 Python 3 Linux yum Python 2 Python 3 Python 2
Post.more: Python 3 Python 3 Linux Python 2 Python 3 Linux yum Python 2 Python 3 Python 2

Post.title: pymysql
Post._content:
`pymysql`  MySQL  `fetchone()`  `fetchall()` 

```python
import pymysql

connection = {
    "host": "",
    "user": "",
    "passwd": "",
    "db": "",
    "charset": "utf8"
}

conn = pymysql.connect(**connection)
cursor = conn.cursor()
sql = "blabla"
cursor.execute(sql)
result = cursor.fetchall()
```

 `cursorclass`  `pymysql.cursors.DictCursor`  `fetchone()`  `fetchall()` 

```python
import pymysql

connection = {
    "host": "",
    "user": "",
    "passwd": "",
    "db": "",
    "charset": "utf8",
    "cursorclass": pymysql.cursors.DictCursor
}
conn = pymysql.connect(**connection)
cursor = conn.cursor()
sql = "blabla"
cursor.execute(sql)
result = cursor.fetchall()
```
Post.raw:
---

date: 2016-12-01 10:10:14
tags:
  - MySQL

  - 
---

 `pymysql`  MySQL  `fetchone()`  `fetchall()` 

```python
import pymysql

connection = {
    "host": "",
    "user": "",
    "passwd": "",
    "db": "",
    "charset": "utf8"
}

conn = pymysql.connect(**connection)
cursor = conn.cursor()
sql = "blabla"
cursor.execute(sql)
result = cursor.fetchall()
```

 `cursorclass`  `pymysql.cursors.DictCursor`  `fetchone()`  `fetchall()` 

```python
import pymysql

connection = {
    "host": "",
    "user": "",
    "passwd": "",
    "db": "",
    "charset": "utf8",
    "cursorclass": pymysql.cursors.DictCursor
}
conn = pymysql.connect(**connection)
cursor = conn.cursor()
sql = "blabla"
cursor.execute(sql)
result = cursor.fetchall()
```

Post.title: Saltstack
Post._content:
salt-master

```shell
yum install -y salt-master
systemctl enable salt-master.service
systemctl start salt-master.service
```

 salt-minion

```shell
yum install -y salt-minion
systemctl enable salt-minion.service
systemctl start salt-minion.service
```

 TCP 4505TCP 4506  zeroMQ 

```shell
iptables -I INPUT -m state --state new -m tcp -p tcp --dport 4505 -j ACCEPT
iptables -I INPUT -m state --state new -m tcp -p tcp --dport 4506 -j ACCEPT
```

 `/etc/salt/master`

```
interface: { IP }

#  `salt-key -a {id}`  key 
auto_accept: true

#  Saltstack 
file_roots:
    base:
        - /srv/salt
```

 Saltstack 

 `/etc/salt/minion`

```
master: { IP }

#  id
id: {id}
```

 Saltstack

```python
import functools.reduce
```

Post.title: Python
Post.raw:
---
title: Python 
date: 2015-08-19 11:50:09
tags:
  - Python
  - 
---

 Python  `object` 

```python
# 
class new_class(object)
    pass

# 
class classic_class(object):
    pass
```

Python  Python 

```python
class A:
    def foo(self):
        print('called A.foo()')

class B(A):
    pass

class C(A):
    def foo(self):
        print('called C.foo()')

class D(B, C):
    pass

if __name__ == '__main__':
    d = D()
    d.foo()
```

BC  A D  BC  C  A  `foo()` 

 A  D  `foo()` Python  `foo()`  B-A-C  A  `foo()`

 A  D  `foo()` Python  `foo()`  B-C-A  C  `foo()`

 D  C  C  `foo()` 

 Python 3.x  A  `object`  D  `foo()`  C  `foo()` Python 2.7  `object`
Post.content:
Python object

Python Python

BC A D BC C A foo()

A D foo() Python foo() B-A-C A foo()

A D foo() Python foo() B-C-A C foo()

D C C foo()

Python 3.x A object D foo() C foo() Python 2.7 object
Post.more:
Python object

Python Python

BC A D BC C A foo()

A D foo() Python foo() B-A-C A foo()

A D foo() Python foo() B-C-A C foo()

D C C foo()

Python 3.x A object D foo() C foo() Python 2.7 object

Post.title: Python
Post._content:
Python  `list.sort()`  `sorted(list)`  `key` 

1112 `key`  lambda 

```python
from pprint import pprint
 
lst = [
    (2, 1),
    (1, 2),
    (1, 3), 
    (1, 1) 
]
 
pprint(sorted(lst), key=lambda x: x[0])
# 
# [
#     (1, 2),
#     (1, 3), 
#     (1, 1), 
#     (2, 1) 
# ]
 
pprint(sorted(lst), key=lambda x: (x[0], x[1]))
# 
# [
#     (1, 1),
#     (1, 2), 
#     (1, 3), 
#     (2, 1) 
# ]
```
Post.raw:
---
title: Python 
date: 2017-08-16 14:25:44
tags:
  - Python
---

 Python  `list.sort()`  `sorted(list)`  `key` 

1112 `key`  lambda 

```python
from pprint import pprint
 
lst = [
    (2, 1),
    (1, 2),
    (1, 3), 
    (1, 1) 
]
 
pprint(sorted(lst), key=lambda x: x[0])
# 
# [
#     (1, 2),

#     (1, 1),

# ]
 
pprint(sorted(lst), key=lambda x: (x[0], x[1]))
```

Post.title: json.dumps()  ensure_ascii
Post._content:
`json.dumps()`  `ensure_ascii`  `False`

 `json.dumps()`  ASCII 

```python
import json

print(json.dumps(""))
# "\u4e2d"

print(json.dumps("", ensure_ascii=False))
# ""
```

Post.title: Python datetime
Post._content:
```python
import time
from datetime import datetime
 
# 
timestamp = time.time()
 
# 
time_array = time.localtime(timestamp)
 
# 
timestamp = time.mktime(time_array())
 
# 
time_array = time.strptime(format_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
 
# 
format_time = time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', time_array)
 
# datetime 
ts = dt.timestamp()
 
#  datetime
dt = datetime.fromtimestamp(ts)
 
# 
time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
```
Post.raw:
---
title: Python datetime 
date: 2014-12-03 10:12:33
tags: 
  - Python
---

```python
import time
from datetime import datetime
 
# 
timestamp = time.time()
 
# 
time_array = time.localtime(timestamp)
 
# 
timestamp = time.mktime(time_array())
 
# 
time_array = time.strptime(format_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
 
# 
format_time = time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', time_array)
 
# datetime 
ts = dt.timestamp()
 
#  datetime
dt = datetime.fromtimestamp(ts)
 
# 
time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
```
